sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container
    class="fill-height"
    fluid
    >
        <v-row
        align="center"
        justify="center"
        >
            <v-col
                cols="12"
                sm="8"
                lg="4"
                xl="4"
                md="6"
            >
                <v-card class="elevation-12">
                <v-toolbar
                    color="primary"
                    dark
                    flat
                >
                    <v-toolbar-title>Вход</v-toolbar-title>
                </v-toolbar>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-form @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
                    <v-text-field
                        label="E-mail"
                        name="email"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-account"
                        type="email"
                        v-model.trim="email"
                        :class="{invalid: ($v.email.$dirty && !$v.email.required) || ($v.email.$dirty && !$v.email.email)}"
                    ></v-text-field>
                    <v-alert
                    dense
                    outlined
                    type="error"
                    class="invalid"
                    v-if="$v.email.$dirty && !$v.email.required"
                    >
                    поле Email не должно быть пустым
                    </v-alert>
                    <v-alert
                    dense
                    outlined
                    type="error"
                    class="invalid"
                    v-else-if="$v.email.$dirty && !$v.email.email"
                    >
                    введите корректный Email
                    </v-alert>

                    <v-text-field
                        id="password"
                        label="Пароль"
                        name="password"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-lock"
                        type="password"
                        v-model.trim="password"
                    ></v-text-field>
                    <v-alert
                    dense
                    outlined
                    type="error"
                    class="invalid"
                    v-if="$v.password.$dirty && !$v.password.required"
                    >
                    пароль не должно быть пустым
                    </v-alert>
                    <v-alert
                    dense
                    outlined
                    type="error"
                    class="invalid"
                    v-else-if="$v.password.$dirty && !$v.password.minLength"
                    >
                    пароль должен быть не менее {{$v.password.$params.minLength.min}} символов. Сейчас он {{password.length}}
                    </v-alert>
                    <v-card-actions>
                        <router-link to="/signup" class="text--primary">Зарегистрироваться</router-link>
                        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                        <v-btn color="primary" type="submit">Войти</v-btn>
                    </v-card-actions>
                    </v-form>
                </v-card-text>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import {email, required, minLength} from 'vuelidate/lib/validators'
export default {
    name: 'Login',
    data: () => ({
        email: '',
        password: ''
    }),
    validations: {
        email: {email, required},
        password: {required, minLength: minLength(8)}
    },
    methods: {
        onSubmit(){
            if(this.$v.$invalid){
                this.$v.$touch()
                return
            }
            const formData = {
                email: this.email,
                password: this.password
            }
            console.log(formData)
            this.$router.push('/')
        }
    }
}
</script>
